amendment.description: To restore a previous policy regarding restrictions on use of Department of Defense medical facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 691 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 192.

action.text: Amendment SA 691 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S6831-6833; text: CR S6831) To restore a previous policy regarding restrictions on use of Department of Defense medical facilities.
